```{r}

```

```{r}
course <- c("個體經濟學","投資學","總體經濟學")
str_subset(course,"經濟學")
str_detect(course,"經濟學")
```

```{r}
month <- c("3","4","2")
day <- c("11","5","7")
char1 <- c("月","月","月")
char2 <- c("日","日","日")
month
char1
day 
char2
str_c(month,char1,day,char2)
```

```{r}
str_c(month,c("月"),day,c("日"))
str_c(month,"月",day,"日")
```

```{r}
month
day
str_c(month,day, sep="-")
```

```{r}
library(readr)
githubData <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/githubData.csv")
username <- githubData$`GitHub username`[11:16]
reponame <- githubData$`GitHub repo name`[11:16]
```

```{r}
username
reponame
```

```{r}
a <- c("https://github.com")
username
reponame
  
str_c(a,username,reponame,sep = "/")
```
